manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Potency Classics Face Finishing & Firming Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 This fast-absorbing, oil-free, tinted moisturizer with SPF delivers powerful antioxidant benefits that help minimize the appearance of wrinkles and imperfections. Our unique, tinted face moisturizer deeply hydrates for silky-smooth, supple skin, while a mineral-based SPF 30 protects skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Formulated with unique pigment-filled capsules that slowly release upon application, this lightweight, tinted moisturizer works well for all skin types. Use alone or under any foundation for a luminous finish. If you've been searching for an oil-free tinted moisturizer with SPF that isn’t too heavy or tacky, you've found the one. Infuses the skin with essential hydration to help minimize the look of lines and wrinkles.Enriched with antioxidants for a smoother appearance and dewy glow.Oil-free moisturizer that delivers just a hint of tint with a mineral-based broad spectrum SPF 30.

Short Description A lightweight, fast-absorbing moisturizer to deliver all-day hydration with a hint of luminous tint. Skin looks tightened and plumped. Skin Concerns Dullness - Dry Skin - Loss of Radiance - Fine Lines & Wrinkles Texture Lotion Scent Rose Featured Ingredients Alpha Lipoic Acid (ALA) - Candeia Tree Extract - Mineral-Based Sunscreen Application Massage onto cleansed face and neck using a gentle upward motion in the morning. For best results, apply after your favorite Perricone MD serum, serum concentrate or facial cream. SPF SPF 30 Size 2 fl. oz.

Hyaluronic Intensive Moisturizer Face Finishing & Firming Moisturizer Face Finishing & Firming Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Finishing & Firming Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Retinol Recovery Overnight Moisturizer Hyaluronic Intensive Hydrating Mask Product Description A gel-cream moisturizer to deliver intense hydration for plumper, healthier-looking skin. Indulgent, rose-scented moisturizer to deeply moisturize and treat for a luminous-looking complexion. Protects and deeply moisturizes for a radiant-looking complexion. A lightweight, fast-absorbing moisturizer to deliver all-day hydration with a hint of luminous tint. Skin looks tightened and plumped. Works overnight to intensely nourish for a firmer, smoother, healthier-looking complexion. Instantly nourishes and hydrates for a visibly plump and smooth complexion.

Growth Factor Firming & Lifting Eye Serum Growth Factor Firming & Lifting Serum Hyaluronic Intensive Hydrating Serum Face Finishing & Firming Toner Hyaluronic Intensive Body Therapy Classics Nutritive Cleanser Product Description Instantly nourishes and hydrates for a visibly plump and smooth complexion. Instantly nourishes and hydrates for a visibly plump and smooth complexion. Immediate & deep hydration for a visibly plump & smooth complexion Instantly revitalizes & visibly tightens pores for a firmer, even-looking complexion Immediate and intense hydration for visibly firm and smooth skin. Gentle gel cleanser to soften, condition and prepare skin for treatment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for My Face Skin
reviews.reviewText: This is my second face cream - Perricone MD High Potency Classics: Face Finishing & Firming Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30, and let me tell you, it's become an absolute game-changer in my skincare routine. This is actually my second jar of this marvelous cream, and I cannot help but rave about it.One of the standout features of this tinted moisturizer is its incredible ability to provide intense hydration without leaving my skin feeling greasy or oily. As someone with combination skin, finding a moisturizer that strikes the perfect balance can be quite a challenge. However, Perricone MD has truly mastered the formula here. Upon application, the moisturizer effortlessly glides on my face, melting into my skin with a lightweight, non-greasy texture.The level of hydration this product delivers is outstanding. I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's overall moisture levels since I started using it. Even during the driest seasons, my skin feels plump and supple, as if it's been drenched in a hydrating elixir. It's an incredibly satisfying feeling to know that my skin is being nourished and protected throughout the day.Additionally, the tinted aspect of this moisturizer is an added bonus. The natural, sheer coverage evens out my skin tone beautifully, giving me a healthy, radiant glow. It's the perfect solution for those days when I want to achieve a flawless, dewy complexion without the need for heavy makeup. Plus, the broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection ensures that my skin is shielded from harmful UV rays, which is crucial for maintaining youthful-looking skin.Beyond its moisturizing and tinting properties, the Perricone MD High Potency Classics moisturizer contains an array of beneficial ingredients that are incredibly kind to my skin. Infused with antioxidants, such as alpha lipoic acid and vitamin C ester, it works wonders in promoting a more youthful appearance while protecting against environmental stressors.Lastly, the packaging of this product is both sleek and practical. The 2-ounce jar is travel-friendly, and the design ensures that the cream remains fresh and hygienic throughout its use.In conclusion, I cannot recommend the Perricone MD High Potency Classics: Face Finishing & Firming Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 enough. It has truly transformed my skincare routine, providing the perfect balance of hydration, sun protection, and a natural, radiant finish. If you're looking for a tinted moisturizer that will leave your skin feeling nourished, without any hint of greasiness, this is the one for you. Prepare to fall in love with your skin all over again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to massage in to face and so subtly blurs the lines and uneven skin tones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the subtle color. It evens out the skin tone and it smells really good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Staple for years
reviews.reviewText: I’m 40. Light medium skin. I wear this instead of foundation or any face make-up everyday and will continue to as long as they make it. I love it. It is light coverage, and I rub it until it blends in. Got it for my mom a year ago and now she is a lifer as well. I use about two jars a year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars this is a wierd cream
reviews.reviewText: this cream seems to turn a dark tint , once you apply it to your face , I dont like that . it isnt real moisturizing either , seems like . its just o.k.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best facial moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Absolute best moisturizer …put on skin. Wait for 10 mins for complete dry. Then apply makeup for flawless finish! My third order :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars If you like sallow skin…so disappointed!
reviews.reviewText: I did have high hopes for this product! While I really do marginally appreciate the moisturizing aspect of this cream, part of the reason that I bought it was because of the fact it had tinting. I usually use these types of products as a foundation as I don’t like too many things on my skin. I cannot use this for that purpose at all. The tint of it makes me look sallow, ill, and unhealthy in general. I have to put on my other moisturizer which I should’ve just purchased again from Amazon. Maybe one of their other products is better. Recommend if you want to try this product buy it from one of your local stores that actually take returns on beauty items, such as target. I would give it a half star, but I can’t. Buyer beware! This is a very expensive expensive moisturizer to be unhappy with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Ever Tinted Moisturiser
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Perricone MD Tinted Moisturiser for years and in my opinion its the best. Non drying, looks natural and gives a healthy glow. For some reason I couldn't get it in the UK so glad that the US still stocks this product. Good for an ageing skin plus its a good sun protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This moisturisers is amazing, a light tint and even coverage to feel plump and fresh without over doing it. My daily go to, happily wear this without any other makeup. Leaves my skin looking super glowy and hydrated - have been buying this for a couple of years now and safe to say I'm hooked.

reviews.reviewTitle: Su textura y el tono de piel que te deja
reviews.reviewText: Es maravillosa, su textura y sobre todo el tono de piel que te deja, es l tercera vez que la compro y aunque es un poco cara, merece la pena por la calidad, a todo sumarle que tiene un factor de protección 30

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Perricone md products since my early forties. I am now closing in on sixty . Though they are considered purchases , I have never been let down by any of them . Face finishing and firming tinted moisturiser, is just as written on the box . Out of all their products, this is my favourite! And would be my desert island product.I love it .It is a multi purpose product It gives a healthy subtly tanned , glowing appearance to the skin when applied . It is an amazing anti ageing moisturiser in its own right . It , unlike many tinted products or most foundations , has a 30 factor sunscreen. It is a mineral based one , which is supposed to be healthier. You are advised to at least wear a 30 factor. Though it is not heavy like many foundations, and does not totally cover spots . It gives such a healthy glow that you really do not notice them as you would without using a product . Your face has a luminous dewy look . I use this product , for both day and evenings with no problems. It is particularly good for the day . Once applied , voila ! There is nothing else to apply , because you just applied all needed .
Esta marca nunca falla. Es una apuesta segura. Hidrata, ilumina e iguala el tono. No es maquillaje, no es CC cream....es mucho mejor!
